name: love life log
description:
love life log, shares my personal love life in a 3D digital space by showcasing an abstraction of my romances. Not only that, but it shares every aspect whether it's the painful or happy memories I have. Explore around to learn more or enjoy the surroundings of the game to find little excerpts throughout the different scenes.

INSTRUCTIONS:

WASD + MOUSE

walk around and explore! enjoy !
